alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nueces, western San Patricio, northeastern Jim Wells, southeastern Live Oak and south central Bee Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Sinton, or near Mathis, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sinton, Mathis, Skidmore, Odem, St. Paul, Lake City, San Patricio, Lagarto, Edroy, Bluntzer, Tynan, Sandia, West Sinton, Argenta, Papalote, Mount Lucas, Dinero, Lakeside, Lake Corpus Christi and Pernitas Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 16 and 49. US Highway 181 between mile markers 598 and 620. US Highway 77 between mile markers 646 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak
